description: Capture the litter cleanup process, including the location, date, and any other relevant details. Each litter cleanup action should be documented separately.

media.title: Capture the Litter Cleanup
media.description: Please take a photo of the location where you will be picking up the litter. You can also take photos of the litter to document its condition.

details.title: Input Litter Cleanup Details
details.description: Please provide the following details about the litter cleanup process.
details.feedbackPlaceholder: Provide feedback or any issues during the litter cleanup process

inputs.title: Litter Type
inputs.placeholder: Select the different litter picked up

inputs.title: Litter Removed
inputs.placeholder: Enter the number of pieces of litter removed

review.title: Review Litter Cleanup
review.description: Please review the details you have provided before submitting.
